locations.green: Green spaces are abound in this picturesque Deepdene location, which offers recreational playing fields, scenic cycle paths, and lively playgrounds.
locations.dine: You’re an easy trip to a variety of fantastic eateries.
locations.school: Some of Melbourne’s most sought-after public and private schools are just moments from your door.
locations.recreation: Deepdene and the surrounding areas also deliver a number of wonderful leisure and recreation attractions.
locations.shopping: Your weekly shopping routine is made easy with The Gratis being in close proximity to both Camberwell Junction and Kew Junction shopping areas.
locations.transport: Something about train, tram & close by freeway.
